title: Japanese Bilingual Customer Service Representative
description: We are seeking a bilingual Japanese Customer Service Representative to join our team. The ideal candidate will provide exceptional customer support to our Japanese-speaking clients and assist with product inquiries, technical support, and order processing. Fluency in Japanese and English required. Benefits include health insurance, 401k, and paid time off.
